Entries.eventSeen_101_memory_oneweek: Did Emmett say anything about our date the other day?#$b#Wait, don't tell me... I'm better off not knowing. Maybe I can still salvage my dignity.$s
Entries.dating_Emily: I... um... heard that you and Emmett are together. Congratulations.$s
Entries.Thu8: I heard Emmett has a friend who lives in the desert. Do you know anything about her?#$e#I wonder if she's single...$s

Entries.dating_Emily: %Emmett has a big smile on his face.
Entries.winter_Sat: Do you know how to cook 'Bean Hotpot'?#$e#I like that dish quite a bit.$h%revealtaste:Emily:207#$e#It's hard to get fresh ingredients in the winter, huh?
Entries.AcceptGift_(TR)ParrotEgg: Oh, good, it's still warm... Poor thing, where's it's father? *Whisper* ...I'll be your father, don't worry... Poor baby.$s#$b#I'm glad you gave this to me, @. I'll take very good care of it.
Entries.Mon: Have I told you Haley and I are siblings? Strange, isn't it?
Entries.Sat6: Do you ever think about the texture of fabric, @? Each texture has a distinct personality... feel my suit... see?
Entries.winter_Sun6: My sister and I might fight sometimes, but I would really miss her if she left.#$e#I think she'll become a very nice young lady some day... Don't tell her I said that.$h#$e#So, is there anything you want to talk about?
Entries.winter_Sun6_inlaw_Haley: Say hi to my sister for me! And remind her to visit me tomorrow.

Entries.winter_Sun6_inlaw_Haley: Say hi to my brother for me! And remind him to visit me tomorrow.

Entries.reject_866: That's a very pretty rose, dear. Have you shown it to Emmett? It makes me think of him.

Entries.dating_Emily_memory_oneweek: Emmett has a real pep in his step lately... I wonder why? *wink*
Entries.Wed: Emmett's been working here for a while now. I don't know what I'd do without him!#$e#I would hate to have to clean all those pots by myself.$s
Entries.Thu6: Clint comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by himself.#$e#Sometimes he glances over at Emmett with a nervous look. Hmmm.#$e#Maybe that's why he comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me.

Entries.eventSeen_12_memory_twoweeks: My parents sent another postcard... I guess they're in the middle of a cruise down the Gem Sea Coast.#$e#They said me and Emmett could join them at any point, but let's be honest... who wants to go on vacation with their parents?
Entries.eventSeen_11_memory_oneweek: The other day, Emmett baked something called a 'squirrel loaf'...$u#$e#How'd it taste? Um... well, if my tail was a little bushier I probably would've loved it.$h
Entries.divorced_Emily: Things didn't work out between you and Emmett, huh? Well... It happens.#$e#It *is* kind of awkward that you're both still living in this tiny town, though.
Entries.married_Emily_memory_oneweek: Is Emmett settling into the farm life?#$e#You know, I was starting to wonder if Emmett would ever get married...
Entries.Resort_Towel_3: Emmett's friend had this swimsuit shipped to me from all the way out in Zuzu City.#$e#City fashion is on a whole different level, isn't it?$h
Entries.summer_Sun: Emmett usually cooks dinner... But he makes weird stuff like quinoa.
Entries.summer_Sun6: #$1 HaleySister#I talked to my brother for a while last night. I actually enjoyed it quite a bit.#$e#You know, Emmett's not actually that weird. I guess we have more in common than I used to think.#$e#Don't tell him I said so.
Entries.Introduction: Oh... you're that new farmer boy, aren't you?^Oh... You're that new farmer girl, or whatever. Aren't you?#$e#Huh? Oh... I'm Haley.#$e#Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be cute.^Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be pretty... Actually, nevermind.$h
Entries.eventSeen_13_memory_oneweek: %Haley greets you with a smile. You notice that she's wearing her Great-Grandma's bracelet.
Entries.eventSeen_12_memory_oneweek: Wow, looks like someone's read the latest issue of 'Super Fashion Girl'... muddy boots are totally in right now!$h
Entries.married_Emily: Well, I guess this makes you my 'brother-in-law', huh? That's funny to think about.^Hey, I guess we're kind of like sisters now!$h
Entries.dating_Haley_memory_oneyear: So, what's the idea here... am I just going to be your 'girlfriend' forever...?$7
Entries.Sun: My brother is so weird. Sometimes I wonder if we're actually related.$u
Entries.Event_beach1: No, you won't! This bracelet was passed down to me by my great-grandmother!$a
Entries.fall_Mon6: $p 48#Did I ever tell you I found another one of my great-grandma's bracelets in the attic?|See this bracelet? It belonged to my great-grandmother.#$e#She was a really interesting lady.
Entries.winter_Thu6: Maybe I'll donate some of my skirts to a charity this spring.#$e#I mean, I do have over 1,000 skirts.$h#$e#...what?

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: A day like this is a blessing from mother nature.
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Every moment has a unique and precious beauty... do you notice? It can be easy to forget, sometimes.
Entries.winter_15: On a day like this, I have a craving for cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, and cardamom.

Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I hope Emmett isn't too lonely all by herself. I should visit him again soon.$7
Entries.OneKid_3: Isn't it strange? I'm not used to being a mother.

Entries.married_Emily: How'd the big day go? Emmett came up a while ago and told me all about your plans.#$b#I'll have to come visit you two on the farm sometime!
Entries.Wed: Why hello there! If you see my friend Emmett in town, could you tell him I said 'Hi'?#$e#Thanks!$h

Action!$u"/pause 1500/speak Emily "I thought we had something special... I guess I was wrong.$s"/pause 500/speak Clint "I... I... Uh..."/emote Shane 12/playMusic playful/speak Shane "Cut!"/speak Clint "I'm sorry!$s"/faceDirection Clint 3/speak Clint "It's hard to remember my lines when his face is right in front of me like that...$s"/emote Emily 8 true/emote Shane 8/pause 500/showFrame Shane 17/pause 500/jump Shane/pause 800/speak Shane "Oh, hey."/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Shane "Check out my new camera...#$b#Joja Co. is having a video advertisement competition. The prize is 10,000g."/showFrame Shane 16/pause 500/emote Shane 16/showFrame Shane 17/pause 500/speak Shane "Hey! I want you to be in this shot... okay?#$b#Just walk by Clint and Emily in the background while they're talking...
